title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: A Detailed Report on Recent Military Actions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A military structure was identified next to a military infrastructure where a terrorist from Hezbollah organization was seen; IDF attacked terror targets in southern Lebanon.

A short while ago, combat aircraft attacked a military infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the El-Khiyam area where a terrorist from the terrorist organization was staying.

During the night, combat aircraft attacked a military structure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the village of Khila in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today an explosive device of the Hezbollah terrorist organization that crossed from Lebanon territory landed in an open area in the Rosh Hanikra area, no injuries were reported.

Following the alerts that were activated earlier today in the Upper Galilee area, a missile was fired towards a target suspected as an airborne target that crossed from Lebanon, after an investigation it turned out that it was a false identification.

Attached is footage from the attack on the military infrastructure where a terrorist from the Hezbollah terrorist organization was staying: https://bit.ly/3PSY6Ba
